name: Knowledge Is Power (itch)
description:
You are a spy-in-training in a new agency specialising in android cloning.

In this training session, you will be tasked with using an android clone to explore a hostile enemy base, gathering as much intel as possible before it gets destroyed. Then, you'll get a chance to plan your route using your own knowledge of the map, the target's position and the enemy positions.

Finally, once you're ready, you'll be able to execute your plan and shoot your way to the target using your GUNSLINGER ability. Use your intel to help you clear rooms quickly before they get a chance to fire back. Knowledge is power.

If you succeed in your training, you'll be able to try again to complete various challenges and playstyles, including:

  • Clean Job: Complete the mission without raising the alarm.
  • It Was Obvious: Complete the mission without first discovering the target's location.
  • Winging It: Complete the mission without first discovering any part of the level.
  • Silent Assassin: Complete the mission without raising the alarm, and a maximum of 2 non-targets killed.

Controls:

  • WASD: Move/pan map
  • Space: GUNSLINGER (Only available in action mode)
  • Left-click: Shoot (Only available in action mode)
  • Right-click: Interact with doors

Known issues:

  • The game might lag when panning the map around in Planning mode. It'll go away after a while by itself.

Enjoy!
